recommendations.comment: Wow! What an excellent resource by @chriscoyier: thepowerofserverless.info. I hadn't realized just how much you can do and how many options there are when going "serverless".
The Power of Serverless for Front-End Developers  https://t.co/jzfDY3yAVl
Such Serverless. Much power. Wow ðŸ˜®  https://t.co/8z7xDOFgQ8

My link of the day comes from the @jamstackconf talk by @chriscoyier on the power of the Front End Developer! thepowerofserverless.info is a great concise resource for experimenting with tools and serverless tech.
